channel.title: Forgotten island - place where Pking begins!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [url=http://www.huntscape.lt][img]http://www.island.huntscape.lt/logo.png[/img][/url] TRY Forgotten island: [url=http://www.huntscape.lt/index.php?page=play-forgotten-island]Download client or Webclient[/url] Home = Small city (Forgotten island) Teleports - [COLOR=Green]Free.[/COLOR] Server uptime - [COLOR=green]98%[/COLOR] Server info: Forgotten island 604 items + npc + gfx + anims. [SIZE=4][COLOR=YellowGreen][IMG]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/artua/pirates/48/treasure-icon.png[/img] Costume treasure system![/COLOR][IMG]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/artua/pirates/48/treasure-icon.png[/img]
[SPOILER=More info about costume treasures] Get a spade from shops and search for treasures Total treasures:[COLOR=YellowGreen]28[/COLOR] Treasures locations: Greater Demon zone ([COLOR=Red]Wild[/COLOR]) Hills Giant ([COLOR=red]Wild[/COLOR]) Rock crabs ([COLOR=YellowGreen]Safe[/COLOR]) Home ([COLOR=YellowGreen]Safe[/COLOR]) Mage bank ([COLOR=Red]Wild[/COLOR]) Edgeville ([COLOR=red]Wild[/COLOR]) Treasures are GLOBAL so if someone found treasure when other player can't get again this treasure. Treasures re spawn every 1 hour.[/SPOILER] [b]UNIQUE[/b] referral SYSTEM!!! [SPOILER=More info about referral system] Invite friends and get prizes! Forgotten Island has AUTOMATIC inviting system that any other server doesn't have. About the system: it is hard to program, but for a user it's easy to use. I'm just advertising my adress ([url=http://www.huntscape.lt/ref.php?username=yournickname]HuntScape - Home[/url]). When a person come to your given adress, he is registered as invited by you. When he begins to play FOrgotten Island, system find his nickname itself and recognise it. When the invited person gets 100 F.I.P you get 30 F.I.P as a prize. System is easy to use. If you got any questions - just ask. [/spoiler] [SIZE=5]Webclient! (compatible with [B]Linux[/B] OS!)[/size] [URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/web.png[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]New quest tab! [/SIZE][URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/forgottenquest.png[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]::reset command![/size] [URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/reset.gif[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]Top 3 Pkers (automatic) [/SIZE][URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/top3.png[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]Miasmic barrage! [/SIZE][URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/miasmic.gif[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]Perfect hybriding! [/SIZE][URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/hyb.gif[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5][COLOR=Red]Dragon[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Claws[/COLOR] [/SIZE][URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/dclaws.gif[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]Turmoil[/size] [URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/turmoil.gif[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]Shops[/size] [URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/shops2.gif[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]Spirit shields[/size] [URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/spirits.gif[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]Costume Green whip spec[/size] [URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/poison.gif[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]Korasis (now max hit is 74)[/size] [URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/korasis.gif[/img][/URL] [SIZE=5]Zoom in and Zoom out![/size] [URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/zoomin.gif[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=5]New autocast [/SIZE] [URL=http://www.huntscape.lt][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/gifs/autocasting.gif[/img][/URL]
[B][SIZE=5]Commands[/size][/b] [SPOILER=Commands] ::pure * ::changepassword newpassword (change your password) ::sit ::unsit ::fip To check Forgotten island points and agility points ::reset and you choice what skill you want reset! ::rules server rules ::kdr Kill Death Ratio ::gwd ::strykeworms[/SPOILER] [size=5]Fullscreen and starter[/size] [SPOILER=Fullscreen and starter][IMG]http://www.huntscape.lt/full.png[/img][/SPOILER] Website: [url=http://www.HuntScape.lt]Forgotten island - HuntScape v2![/url][/center]

item.title: Forgotten island - place where Pking begins!
item.dc:creator: @shapaklekas shapaklekas
item.description:
@shapaklekas wrote:

[CENTER]

TRY Forgotten island: Download client or Webclient
Home = Small city (Forgotten island)
Teleports - [COLOR=Green]Free.[/COLOR]
Server uptime - [COLOR=green]98%[/COLOR]
Server info: Forgotten island 604 items + npc + gfx + anims.
[SIZE=4][COLOR=YellowGreen] Costume treasure system![/COLOR]

[SPOILER=More info about costume treasures]
Get a spade from shops and search for treasures
Total treasures:[COLOR=YellowGreen]28[/COLOR]
Treasures locations:
Greater Demon zone ([COLOR=Red]Wild[/COLOR])
Hills Giant ([COLOR=red]Wild[/COLOR])
Rock crabs ([COLOR=YellowGreen]Safe[/COLOR])
Home ([COLOR=YellowGreen]Safe[/COLOR])
Mage bank ([COLOR=Red]Wild[/COLOR])
Edgeville ([COLOR=red]Wild[/COLOR])
Treasures are GLOBAL so if someone found treasure when other player can’t get again this treasure. Treasures re spawn every 1 hour.[/SPOILER]
UNIQUE referral SYSTEM!!!
[SPOILER=More info about referral system]
Invite friends and get prizes!
Forgotten Island has AUTOMATIC inviting system that any other server doesn’t have. About the system: it is hard to program, but for a user it’s easy to use. I’m just advertising my adress (HuntScape - Home). When a person come to your given adress, he is registered as invited by you. When he begins to play FOrgotten Island, system find his nickname itself and recognise it. When the invited person gets 100 F.I.P you get 30 F.I.P as a prize. System is easy to use. If you got any questions - just ask.
[/spoiler]
[SIZE=5]Webclient! (compatible with Linux OS!)[/size]

[SIZE=5]New quest tab!
[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]::reset command![/size]

[SIZE=5]Top 3 Pkers (automatic)
[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Miasmic barrage!
[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Perfect hybriding!
[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][COLOR=Red]Dragon[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Claws[/COLOR]
[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Turmoil[/size]

[SIZE=5]Shops[/size]

[SIZE=5]Spirit shields[/size]

[SIZE=5]Costume Green whip spec[/size]

[SIZE=5]Korasis (now max hit is 74)[/size]

[SIZE=5]Zoom in and Zoom out![/size]

[SIZE=5]New autocast
[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]Commands[/size]
[SPOILER=Commands]
::pure *
::changepassword newpassword (change your password)
::sit ::unsit
::fip To check Forgotten island points and agility points
::reset and you choice what skill you want reset!
::rules server rules
::kdr Kill Death Ratio
::gwd
::strykeworms[/SPOILER]
[size=5]Fullscreen and starter[/size]
[SPOILER=Fullscreen and starter][/SPOILER]
Website: Forgotten island - HuntScape v2![/center]

Read full topic
